column4: Is there any way to use apt to make a 7.04 system a 7.10 system?
QUESTION: Is there any way to use apt to make a 7.04 system a 7.10 system?
most of those excludes are not needed, that was my full backup command ...
I wasn't getting that neat upgrade button in edubuntu 7.04
You can follow the manual steps.. apt-get update apt-get upgrade and apt-get distro-upgrade.. check that last command for spelling on disrto..
I'm more comfy with that anyway
